entry.title: Week in Ethereum News December 9, 2023
entry.summary: Eth News and Links Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade (meta EIP7569) Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH Layer 1 For Stakers Client releases Research Layer 2 EIPs/Standards Stuff for developers Security Ecosystem Enterprise Onchain stats Notable at app layer Job Listings Job listings: $600 for four issues (75 character limit). Pay using 3cities.
